TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit SecurityContextSecurityToken extends System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityToken

summary.span: 表示 WS-SecureConversation 規格定義的權杖。

span.span: Represents the token defined by the WS-SecureConversation specification.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個類別的執行個體包含了金鑰資料以及代表用戶端的驗證資訊。An instance of this class contains key material along with authentication information that represents the client. 使用者會選擇特定的密碼編譯演算法和它搭配使用。The user selects the particular cryptographic algorithm to use with it.

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

summary.span: 釋放由這個物件執行個體使用的 Unmanaged 資源。

span.span: Releases unmanaged resources used by this instance of this object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用這個方法可以關閉或釋放 Unmanaged 資源，例如：實作這個介面的類別之執行個體所持有的檔案、資料流和控制代碼。Use this method to close or release unmanaged resources, such as files, streams, and handles held by an instance of the class that implements this interface. 這個方法依慣例使用於所有與釋放物件所持有的資源相關聯的工作，或準備重複使用的物件。This method is, by convention, used for all tasks associated with freeing resources held by an object, or preparing an object for reuse. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱。For more information, see .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 從開始[!INCLUDE[netfx35_short](~/includes/netfx35-short-md.md)]，這個屬性，就會發出做為網路上 <`sc:Instance`> 項目。Starting with the [!INCLUDE[netfx35_short](~/includes/netfx35-short-md.md)], this property is emitted on the wire as an <`sc:Instance`> element. 在舊版[!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]，它做為發出 <`sc:Generation`> 項目。In prior versions of the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)], it was emitted as an <`sc:Generation`> element.
